outputs.output_descr: The success of Global Compact in the Philippines is dependent on the dynamism, sustainability and viability of the Global Compact Working Group (GCWG). Towards this end, the program should first and foremost address the limitations of the existing GCWG through the following interventions: (1) Review GCWG's composition and make it more inclusive; (2) Conduct regular GCWG meetings to sustain the interest and enthusiasm among its members; (3) Draw-up strategic action plan beyond the availability of seed-funding; (4) Establish tie-ups and linkages with companies, industry associations, NGOs, government agencies, labor groups and international institutions; (5) Develop systems, processes and procedures to follow-up submission of COP; (6) Capacitate business organizations represented in the GCWG; and (7) establish a pool of resource persons.

project_descr: Seed Fund for Global Compact Philippines
project_title: Seed Fund for Global Compact Philippines
